answers.answer: I was induced with my first and i went in at 7am on jan.27.2010 and had my daughter at 4:21pm on jan.28.2010 . I had an epidural but i when i first got there i wasnt dialated or anything so thats why it took so long:) i wasnt any where near labor.

Thankyou, I went for a check up Tuesday I was 50% effaced n 2cm. They gave me a membrane sweep. But iv got to go back today as I suffer from high blood pressure and they want me to deliver by 41weeks im 40+6 today so im guessing they are gunna induce me xx

I had a 2 day induction June 15th, they started cerdivil to help my cervix. When I went in I was 1cm, 50% and he was at a -3. They kept the cerdivil in for 12 hours and it didn't do anything. 8am on the 16th they took the cerdivil out and started me on pitocin. Around noon they broke my water, I was at a 3-4cm and 60-70% by then. After my water broke contractions got worse, they came to do an epidural around 730pm in which did NOT work at all. 8pm i started feeling pushy, nurse came in and I was at 9.5, they Dr wouldn't let me push because he didn't want me to tear my cervix, but in just a few contractions I was ready to push! I pushed for about 30 minute with the nurse, Dr came over and my son was out in 3-4 pushes! It was a VERY smooth and easy labor for me. Although it was long, I had no complications :) I would go through labor over and over again! I'm actually excited to go through it again in the future, even though the pain was crazy.
I was also induced at 41 weeks
I was induced at 38 weeks cause i had preeclampsia! I was 36 hrs in labor with no epidural but never fully dialated so had to end up getting c section!:(

I was in early labour for five days, don't know why my body wasn't hitting active labour, my waters had broke the second day of early labour but I didn't think anything of it as I thought it was a little gush of mucus, cause it was thick( even the doctors where spinning out) didn't realize till the third day when they checked...they said they were going to induce me by the forth day but because they were busy they induced me by the fifth, I started my induction at 7:30a.m, I didn't hit regular contraction till about 8:30, after that my labour flew!! Couple of hours later at 11:54a.m my little boy was born, best experience ever!!

I just went through induction. I started pitocin on Tuesday the 24, had almost exactly 48hrs of labor. I was given demarol at about hr 43, which made me light headed so most of hard labor was spent with my eyes closed and a little loopy. I pushed for about an 1 1/2hrs before my precious girl was born.

question: Think im getting induced this weekend. Gotta go hospital today to find out.Ant ladies got experiences of this they would like to share? X
title: any induced stories? x
